TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Installer extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供自訂安裝的基礎。

span.span: Provides the foundation for custom installations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是.NET Framework 中的所有自訂安裝程式的基底類別。This is the base class for all custom installers in the .NET Framework. 安裝程式都可協助在電腦上安裝應用程式元件。Installers are components that help install applications on a computer. 有幾個步驟，您必須遵循使用:There are several steps you must follow to use an : - 繼承類別。Inherit the class. - 覆寫， ， ，和方法。Override the , , , and methods. - 新增至您在衍生類別，並將它設定為`true`。Add the to your derived class and set it to `true`. - 將您的衍生的類別放在具有您要安裝的應用程式的組件。Put your derived class in the assembly with your application to install. - 叫用安裝程式。Invoke the installers. 例如，使用 InstallUtil.exe 叫用安裝程式。For example, use the InstallUtil.exe to invoke the installers. 屬性包含的安裝程式集合。The property contains a collection of installers. 如果這個執行個體屬於安裝程式集合，屬性設定為包含集合的執行個體。If this instance of is part of an installer collection, the property is set to the instance that contains the collection. 如需使用的範例集合，請參閱類別。For an example of the use of the collection, see the class. ， ， ，和方法類別瀏覽儲存在安裝程式集合屬性，並叫用每個安裝程式的對應方法。The , , , and methods of the class go through the collection of installers stored in the property, and invokes the corresponding method of each installer. ， ， ，和方法都不一定會呼叫在同一個執行個體。The , , , and methods are not always called on the same instance. 例如，一個時安裝並認可應用程式，可能會使用執行個體，然後釋放的參考至該執行個體。For example, one instance might be used while installing and committing an application, and then the reference to that instance is released. 更新版本中，解除安裝應用程式會建立新的參考執行個體，表示方法會呼叫不同的執行個體。Later, uninstalling the application creates a reference to a new instance, meaning that the method is called by a different instance of . 基於這個理由，在衍生類別中，儲存在安裝程式中的電腦的狀態。For this reason, in your derived class, do not save the state of a computer in an installer. 請改用，會在呼叫之間保留，並傳入您， ， ，和方法。Instead, use an that is preserved across calls and passed into your , , , and methods. 兩種情況下說明需要將資訊儲存在狀態電。Two situations illustrate the need to save information in the state-saver . 首先，假設您的安裝程式設定的登錄機碼。First, suppose that your installer sets a registry key. 它應該儲存的索引鍵中的原始值。It should save the key's original value in the . 如果回復安裝，就可以還原為原始值。If the installation is rolled back, the original value can be restored. 接下來，假設安裝程式會取代現有的檔案。Second, suppose the installer replaces an existing file. 將現有的檔案儲存在暫存目錄，且新的位置中檔案的位置。Save the existing file in a temporary directory and the location of the new location of the file in the . 如果回復安裝，較新的檔案是刪除，而且從暫存位置的原始檔案取代。If the installation is rolled back, the newer file is deleted and replaced by the original from the temporary location. 屬性包含有關安裝的資訊。The property contains information about the installation. 例如，記錄檔來安裝，也就是要儲存所需的資訊的檔案位置的位置相關的資訊方法，並安裝可執行檔執行時所輸入的命令列。For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別。The following example demonstrates the use of the class. 它會建立一個類別繼承自。It creates a class which inherits from . 當即將完成，就會發生事件，並顯示訊息。When is about to complete, event occurs and a message is displayed. 若要使用類別，您必須參考**System.Configuration.Install**專案中的組件。To use the class, you must reference the **System.Configuration.Install** assembly in your project. [!code-cpp[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/CPP/installer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/CS/installer.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/VB/installer.vb#1)]

exception.span: 在安裝的 階段時發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred during the phase of the installation.

exception.span: 這個例外狀況會被忽略，安裝會繼續進行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the installation continues.

exception.span: 不過，安裝完成之後，應用程式可能無法正常運作。

span.span: However, the application might not function correctly after the installation is complete.

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法在衍生方法中的第一次。

para.span: 才方法會呼叫方法的這個執行個體中的每個安裝程式成功。

span.span: The method stores information needed to do a correct uninstallation, and calls the method of each installer in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ Context { System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ get(); void set(System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定有關目前安裝的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets information about the current installation.
An that contains information about the current installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含安裝資訊。The property contains installation information. 例如，記錄檔來安裝，也就是要儲存所需的資訊的檔案位置的位置相關的資訊方法，並安裝可執行檔執行時所輸入的命令列。For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. 呼叫程式， ， ，或方法組屬性與方法所需的資訊。The program that calls the , , , or methods sets the property with information that the methods need. 如果安裝程式所屬的安裝程式集合，父安裝程式會設定之前呼叫這些方法的屬性。If an installer belongs to an installer collection, the parent installer sets the property before calling any of these methods. 可以透過存取父 installer屬性。The parent installer can be accessed through the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範屬性類別。The following example demonstrates the property of the class. 內容屬性包含的安裝，也就是要儲存所需的資訊的檔案位置的記錄檔位置的相關資訊方法，並已在命令列輸入時安裝執行可執行檔。The contents of the property contain information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. 在主控台上隨即顯示這些內容。These contents are then displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/CPP/installer_context.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/CS/installer_context.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/VB/installer_context.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property HelpText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ HelpText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得安裝程式集合中所有安裝程式的說明文字。

span.span: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.

value.span: 安裝程式集合中所有安裝程式的說明文字，包括每個安裝程式執行動作的描述，以及可以傳遞給每個安裝程式且每個安裝程式都可了解的安裝可執行檔 (例如，InstallUtil.exe 公用程式) 的命令列選項。

span.span: The help text for all the installers in the installer collection, including the description of what the installer does and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the InstallUtil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by this installer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. 這個屬性定義在類別，而呼叫時，傳回的描述和可執行檔，例如，Installutil.exe 公用程式，可以傳遞至和了解安裝的命令列選項.This property is defined in the class, which, when called, returns the description of the and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the Installutil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by the . [!code-cpp[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/CPP/installer_helptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/CS/installer_helptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/VB/installer_helptext.vb#1)]

exception.span: 安裝程式集合中的安裝程式之一指定 null 參考而不是說明文字。

span.span: One of the installers in the installer collection specifies a null reference instead of help text.

exception.span: 這個例外狀況可能原因是已定義包含說明文字的欄位，但未將其初始化。

span.span: A likely cause for this exception is that a field to contain the help text is defined but not initialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法類別。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 類別衍生自基底類別和會覆寫方法。A class is derived from the base class and the method is overridden. [!code-cpp[Installer_Install#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Install/CPP/installer_install.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Install#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Install/CS/installer_install.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Install#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Install/VB/installer_install.vb#1)]

exception.span: 在集合中有一個安裝程式的 事件處理常式發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred in the event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
-or-

exception.span: 在集合中有一個安裝程式的 事件處理常式發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred in the event handler of one of the installers in the collection.

block.para:
- 如果您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法在衍生方法中的第一次。If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method.方法呼叫方法中所包含的每個安裝程式這個執行個體的屬性。The method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance.包含安裝程式執行之後，這個方法會更新物件 (透過指定參數) 以反映安裝狀態。After the contained installers run, this method updates the object (specified through the parameter) to reflect the status of the installation.應為空白時傳遞至方法。The should be empty when passed to the method.如果要將所有方法成功，方法呼叫。If all the methods succeed, the method is called.否則，方法呼叫。Otherwise, the method is called.
- 如果您要加入至安裝程式執行個體集合方法，請務必執行相同新增至集合中的項目方法。If you need to add installer instances to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method.不過，您可以避免維護這兩種方法中的集合，如果您加入至安裝程式執行個體您自訂安裝程式中的類別建構函式集合。However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Installers As InstallerCollection

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的安裝程式安裝時所需要這個物件的集合才能正確安裝元件的執行個體。The property contains a collection of installers that install objects needed by this instance to correctly install the component. ， ， ，和方法類別瀏覽的安裝程式集合，會叫用每個安裝程式的對應方法。The , , , and methods of the class go through the collection of installers and invokes the corresponding method of each installer. 如果這個執行個體安裝程式集合中包含屬性是包含集合的執行個體。If this instance of is contained in an installer collection, the property is the instance that contains the collection. 如需使用的範例集合，請參閱類別。For an example of the use of the collection, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例會示範和屬性。The following example demonstrates the and properties. 屬性顯示聯。The property shows the associated with an . summary.span: 引發 事件。

summary.span: 取得或設定安裝程式，含有這個安裝程式所屬的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the installer containing the collection that this installer belongs to.

value.span: ，包含這個執行個體所屬的集合；如果這個執行個體不屬於集合，則為 。

span.span: An containing the collection that this instance belongs to, or if this instance does not belong to a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個執行個體屬於安裝程式集合，屬性設定為包含集合的執行個體。If this instance of is part of an installer collection, the property is set to the instance that contains the collection. 如需使用的範例集合，請參閱類別。For an example of the use of the collection, see the class. 屬性包含的安裝程式集合。The property contains a collection of installers. ， ， ，和方法類別瀏覽的安裝程式集合，會叫用每個安裝程式的對應方法。The , , , and methods of the class go through the collection of installers and invokes the corresponding method of each installer. ## Examples 下列範例會示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. 屬性會取得包含集合這個屬於。The property gets the containing the collection that this belongs to. Public Overridable Sub Rollback (savedState As IDictionary)

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中被覆寫時，還原電腦安裝之前的狀態。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, restores the pre-installation state of the computer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method of . 的衍生類別中覆寫方法。The method is overridden in the derived class of . 若要強制安裝復原會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated to force an installation rollback. [!code-cpp[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/CPP/installer_rollback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/CS/installer_rollback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/VB/installer_rollback.vb#1)]

exception.span: 參數為 。

span.span: The parameter is .
-or-

exception.span: 的儲存狀態可能已經損毀。

span.span: The saved-state might have been corrupted.

exception.span: 在安裝的 階段時發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred during the phase of the installation.

exception.span: 這個例外狀況會被忽略，復原會繼續進行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the rollback continues.

exception.span: 不過，復原完成之後，電腦可能無法完全還原至其初始狀態。

span.span: However, the computer might not be fully reverted to its initial state after the rollback completes.

para.span: 當您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法在衍生方法中的第一次。

span.span: When you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method.

para.span: 復原作業會將電腦還原安裝發生之前的狀態。

span.span: A rollback operation restores the computer to the state it was in before the installations occurred.

para.span: 呼叫方法時若方法的這個執行個體，或安裝程式集合中的任何安裝程式無法正確執行。

span.span: The method is called if the method of this instance of , or any installer in the installer collection, fail to run correctly.

para.span: 藉由呼叫所產生的任何例外狀況方法的安裝程式集合中的安裝程式會忽略並繼續執行其他的安裝程式復原。

span.span: Any exceptions generated by calling the methods of the installers in the installer collection are ignored and the rollback of the other installers continues.

Public Overridable Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，包含安裝完成之後的電腦狀態。

span.span: An that contains the state of the computer after the installation was complete.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中被覆寫時，移除安裝。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, removes an installation.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method of . 的衍生類別中覆寫方法。The method is overridden in the derived class of . [!code-cpp[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/CPP/installer_uninstall.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/CS/installer_uninstall.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/VB/installer_uninstall.vb#1)]

exception.span: 的儲存狀態可能已經損毀。

span.span: The saved-state might have been corrupted.

exception.span: 解除安裝時發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred while uninstalling.

exception.span: 這個例外狀況會被忽略，解除安裝會繼續進行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.

exception.span: 不過，解除安裝完成之後，應用程式可能沒有完全解除安裝。

span.span: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstallation completes.

block.para:
- 如果您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法在衍生方法中的第一次。If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method.方法呼叫方法中所包含的每個安裝程式這個執行個體的屬性。The method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance.包含安裝程式執行之後，這個方法會更新物件 (透過指定參數) 以反映安裝狀態。After the contained installers run, this method updates the object (specified through the parameter) to reflect the status of the installation.應為空白時傳遞至方法。The should be empty when passed to the method.如果要將所有方法成功，方法呼叫。If all the methods succeed, the method is called.否則，方法呼叫。Otherwise, the method is called.
- 如果您要加入至安裝程式執行個體集合方法，請務必執行相同新增至集合中的項目方法。If you need to add installer instances to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method.不過，您可以避免維護這兩種方法中的集合，如果您加入至安裝程式執行個體您自訂安裝程式中的類別建構函式集合。However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.
